description:
A girl appears before Laust, an incompetent healer who has just been kicked out of his party. Introducing herself as Narsena, she turns to Laust and says, "Would you be willing to form a party with me?"
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Cette rencontre n`est pas la première, en réalité
Regarding Their Meeting, Which Was, in Fact, a Reunion
Sono Deai, Jitsu wa Saikai ni Tsuki
その出会い, 実は再会につき
